title: 180: Overcoming Rejection with Matthew Del Negro
itunes:title: 180: Overcoming Rejection with Matthew Del Negro
description:
Success is a result of how often you can overcome rejection. In this episode, I sit with actor Matthew del Negro to discuss his journey of facing 10,000 no’s to pursue his art. This is an important reminder for anyone facing rejection!

Connect with Matthew @matthewdelnegro.com.
